## GerstnerWaveGenerator.getOriginZ() method

Gets the Z coordinate of the wave origin if it is an omni-directional wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOriginZ(waveIndex: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |

**Returns:**

number

Z coordinate of the wave origin if it is an omni-directional wave, 0 otherwise.
